issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:

1. On the simulator select the touch control(hand icon)
2. tap on "Create Report"
3. tap on "Category" or "Department" picker field

Expected result: the drop-down list should be opened
Actual result:  it isn't opened. Only when you tap the second time, the list is opened.
fields.summary: Win8: User has to click 2 times to open drop-down pickers using touch control (A)
fields.environment: Windows 8 on a VM, tablet simulator
